name: blastn
command: makeblastdb -in {contigs_file} -dbtype nucl -out {output_dir}/contigs_blastdb && blastn -query {spacers_file} -db {output_dir}/contigs_blastdb -max_target_seqs 1000000 -out {output_dir}/blastn_output.tsv  -num_threads {threads} -task blastn-short -outfmt "6 qaccver saccver nident length mismatch qlen gapopen qstart qend sstart send evalue bitscore"
